Gonna Shrine an Express Worm
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Library: Fan Fiction, Poetry, Birthday List, Links & Non-Fiction Archive: Filk Songs: Gonna Shrine an Express Worm
By Medical Meccanica on Friday, April 28, 2006 - 06:00 pm:

I wrote this for a fake band on another forum just a few minutes ago, because my friend and I are going to hunt at used CD stores for special MR2 Monster CDs. XD It's a parody of "Gonna Dig Up Alec Guiness" by Lemon Demon, which I doubt most people have heard of, unfortunatly. anyways, here goes-

Gonna shrine an Express Worm.
Gonna get that special train.
Gonna freeze him and combine him to make him plain.

Gonna go down to a website
Gonna sprite myself a sign.
Gonna advertise to everyone, tell 'em where to form the line.

Gonna build him blinking, flashing lights
Gonna make him say 'Aight, aight"
And when the people come to glance him, he'll be singing songs and dancin'.
All right, all right.

Gonna shrine an Express Worm
Gonna take him from MR2.
Gonna charge some fans to throw Jolly Ranchers at his shoe.

Gonna pull out all the stops now.
Gonna buy a Beastie Boys CD.
Gonna shrine him and keep all the money just for me.

Gonna raise him up on wires above the mountain peak.
Gonna have him launch Poison Gas from his beak.
And if police come knockin' at my door, he'll say "These aren't the Beaclons you're looking for."

I just got a letter saying that I better stop, quick.
Some legal gumbo...
Seems that Tecmo is ticked

Whatever happened to fair use?
You know?
Whatever happened to free speech?
Where'd it go?
I'm only using my First Amendment right...
You know I won't go down without a fight.

Gonna shrine an Express Worm.
If I can't, then that's a shame.
I could shrine a Drill Tusk, but it wouldn't be the same.
